name: Roll On
description:
* * * Awarded runner-up prize in the iPhone & iPad Game App Challenge (sponsored by Wiley and For Dummies) - November 2010 * * *

Roll and jump your way down the chequered track to the end of each level before the time runs out. Roll On is a fast paced game for the iPhone, iPad & iPod touch. Reminiscent of a number of games from around the early nineties brought up-to-date with crisp hi-definition graphics and slick gameplay. Certain coloured squares affect the behaviour of your ball speeding it up slowing it down or messing with your controls etc. Can you beat all forty-two levels?

Features:
Compatible with ALL iPhones, iPads and iPod Touches running iOS 3.0 or later.
Full Hi-definition support for the iPad and the retina displays on the iPhone 4 & iPod Touch 4G.
Universal application - buy once play on all devices no extra cost for 'HD' version.
42 Challenging levels
Silky smooth 3D graphics at 60fps.
In game music or you can continue to listen to your own music while playing.
